description: Irish police say they will be "encouraging" people to comply with new restrictions on public life.
title: Coronavirus: Irish police patrols promised for virus restrictions
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish police patrols promised for virus restrictions - BBC News
maintext: "Everyone must stay at home other than to travel to and from work, only when work is an essential service, to shop for food or collect a meal, to collect health or medical products, to take brief exercise as long as you adhere to physical distancing," he said.
